title: Enhancing Patient Care Practical Competencies: Lifelong Learning for Instructional Designers and Educational Technologists via Self-Directed Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Instructional Design Theories and Experience with Digital Tools
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design and execute a self-assessment system for their professional development.
Learners can derive three or more practical problem-solving strategies through collaborative learning with peers and online communities.
Learners can apply knowledge acquired during the learning process to practical projects and write performance reports.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
